Sql.CDATA: -- OPENTR accumulate Data IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'v_OpenTR' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[v_OpenTR] GO CREATE VIEW v_OpenTR AS SELECT t.Company, t.StartETA, t.EndETA, t.Sku, t.Warehouse, ( SELECT sum([OpenQty]) FROM v_OpenTRSourceData WHERE ETA < t.EndETA AND Company = t.Company AND Warehouse = t.Warehouse AND Sku = t.Sku ) AS OpenQty FROM( SELECT t.Company, t.Sku, t.Warehouse, t.ETA AS StartETA , isnull(min(t2.ETA), '9999/12/31') AS EndETA, t.OpenQty FROM v_OpenTRSourceData t LEFT JOIN v_OpenTRSourceData t2 ON t.ETA < t2.ETA AND t.Company = t2.Company AND t.Sku = t2.Sku AND t.Warehouse = t2.Warehouse GROUP BY t.Company,t.Sku,t.Warehouse,t.ETA,t.OpenQty ) t
